## NotificationService class

Responsible for queueing and displaying notifications provided by user as a snack bar

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class NotificationService 
```

|  [notify](./notification.notificationservice.notify.md) |  | (notification: [AppNotification](./notification.appnotification.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; void | Displays the provided notification when the snack bar is available |
